A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: bad cinematography\, bad characterization\, and a lot of strange moments that weren't well enacted\, and if these were Comedy these were Not well-executed and were just disturbing sometimes. Combat was rushed and over-the-top\, effects were good yet Unfocused\, and just basically became a movie about flailing your light-saber around and killing all the bad guys. Stream it if it's on your already-paid-for subscription and don't waste your money in theaters or dvd unless you're trying for a blue-ray collection... but just wait until 9 is released as it will be cheaper and your collection isn't complete until that movie anyway.
